title: William Arnold Newton
summary: William Arnold Newton (July 26, 1965 – October 29, 1990) was an American actor, director, producer, beautician, and set-decorator. He acted in gay pornographic films under the name Billy London and Billy Porter and produced gay pornographic films under the name Bill E. London. Newton's gruesome murder is regularly featured in articles listing the most notorious, unsolved Hollywood homicides. In 2023, the case was solved and Newton's killer was identified as Daralyn Madden
